about_the_game:
Escape the Nightmare

Jurig Escape is a 15-minute Free Third-Person Survival Horror game. You will play as the unnamed high-schooler trapped in a looping nightmare: An "empty" school with a revolver in your hand. Shoot the ghost and collect lost souls and escape this never-ending nightmare.

Game Features


    Classic Asian Survival Horror

In this third-person survival horror, you are awake without knowing how you got there. Deprived of choice, you must explore and find a way to escape the area. Be careful because a threatening aura fills the entire place.

    Classic Asian-Indonesian Theme

From Indonesian High School to Pocong (an undead being), The whole experience is enveloped around an Asian-Indonesian setting that hits close to our home.

    Defeat Enemies The Conventional Way

Shoot anything threatening in your way, Collect their souls, and find the escape door.

The Genesis Of Asian-Indonesian Horror

Made in 2010, this is our first prototype. As a first attempt in the game development journey, this demo serves as an experiment and blueprint for the birth of the DreadOut Series.

We unearthed this long-lost game build quite recently. To commemorate DreadOut 10th Anniversary, we released it on Steam for your convenience. Please be mindful of the imperfection since this is an unchanged build from decades ago. We hope you enjoy this relic from the past.
detailed_description:
Escape the Nightmare

Jurig Escape is a 15-minute Free Third-Person Survival Horror game. You will play as the unnamed high-schooler trapped in a looping nightmare: An "empty" school with a revolver in your hand. Shoot the ghost and collect lost souls and escape this never-ending nightmare.

Game Features


    Classic Asian Survival Horror

In this third-person survival horror, you are awake without knowing how you got there. Deprived of choice, you must explore and find a way to escape the area. Be careful because a threatening aura fills the entire place.

    Classic Asian-Indonesian Theme

From Indonesian High School to Pocong (an undead being), The whole experience is enveloped around an Asian-Indonesian setting that hits close to our home.

    Defeat Enemies The Conventional Way

Shoot anything threatening in your way, Collect their souls, and find the escape door.

The Genesis Of Asian-Indonesian Horror

Made in 2010, this is our first prototype. As a first attempt in the game development journey, this demo serves as an experiment and blueprint for the birth of the DreadOut Series.

We unearthed this long-lost game build quite recently. To commemorate DreadOut 10th Anniversary, we released it on Steam for your convenience. Please be mindful of the imperfection since this is an unchanged build from decades ago. We hope you enjoy this relic from the past.
name: Jurig Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.66 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X300 or DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 2.8 GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6400 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
